name: Jim'S Adventures
description:
Jim'S Adventures

We came second (2°) in the competition of Game Maker Italy 2015 :

Jim (a rag doll) finds himself in a world of imagination where you'll find out with him. Jim'S Adventures platform game, have fun too! You'll have to be fast and at the extent to help Jim to find his gold buttons. There will be secret and breathtaking boss.

Characteristics:

  • 12 beautifully designed levels
  • 4 seasons
  • 12 enemies
  • 4 boss
  • 4 secrets in the story (to get more coins).
  • Survival Mode with hordes of enemies with 5 maps (for the moment).

Jim must find all his gold buttons and needs your help, follow him while jumping or running. But be careful: this place is full of nasty monsters ready to do anything to stop you.

Available on Google Play

Available on GameMaker: Player

Vote for us on Steam
